title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: The coolbar layout is getting corrupted when items are deleted from it.
OB: When the delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the second row is also removed unexpectedly.
EB: After pressing the delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, but the second row should remain unchanged.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button and observe.

Expected result:
- The first item on the second row should be deleted.
- The second row should remain unchanged.
